text:
February 19, 2017 12:28 pm Winnipeg police arrest man carrying numerous weapons near Portage Place Sunday morning By Shelden Rogers Reporter Global News 
Police arrested a man causing a disturbance behind Portage Place Sunday morning. Mike Arsenault/Global News What is this?

Sponsored content is written by Global News' without any editorial influence by the sponsor. If you'd like to learn more... - 
WINNIPEG — A man carrying a number of weapons is in police custody after being arrested Sunday morning near Portage Place mall. 
Winnipeg police discovered two men near the back of the mall causing a disturbance around 1:30 a.m. 
Police arrested one of the men, who was possessing a knife, screwdriver and a round of ammunition. 
The 24-year-old is facing up to ten charges including possession of a weapon, and possession of a firearm. © 2017 Global News, a division of Corus Entertainment Inc.
